attributes.action: Save Market Playgroup, an outstanding ofstead Islington nursery
attributes.additional_details: Market playgroup also provide special care for children with special needs. We don't understand why the council have allowed islington to lose an outstanding nursery & why Hyde have sold it cheaply without our knowledge or an offer to us first. If the council are not willing to pay the rent, we have to find a new safe, permanent premises for our children. All children, especially those with special needs, need structure & security which market playgroup & it's staff provide in abundance.
attributes.background: Market playgroup is an affordable outstanding nursery & has been looking after our children for 40yrs. Hyde have sold the premisies & the new landlord has increased the rent by £27,000. which the council are unwilling to pay & we can not afford. We need to find a new suitable premises in Islington

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:
http://democracy.islington.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
